pr_title: [DOCS] Add Zabbix monitoring template to community monitoring integrations

timeline.message:
Added community monitoring integration

Added community monitoring integration by Zabbix.

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            * https://www.zabbix.com/integrations/elasticsearch[Zabbix monitoring template]:
          
          
            
              Monitor the performance and status of your elastic search nodes and cluster with Zabbix, and receive events information.
          
          
            
            * https://www.zabbix.com/integrations/elasticsearch[Zabbix monitoring template]:
          
          
            
              Monitor the performance and status of your {es} nodes and cluster with Zabbix,
          
          
            
              and receive events information.
timeline.author: jrodewig
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -188,7 +188,8 @@ releases 2.0 and later do not support rivers.
 * http://sematext.com/spm/index.html[SPM for Elasticsearch]:
   Performance monitoring with live charts showing cluster and node stats, integrated
   alerts, email reports, etc.
-
+* https://www.zabbix.com/integrations/elasticsearch[Zabbix monitoring template]:
+  Monitor the performance and status of your elastic search nodes and cluster with Zabbix, and receive events information.
